org.jetel.ctl

Class ErrorLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.ctl.ErrorLocation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class ErrorLocation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An error location within CTL code.
    See Also:
    ProblemReporter, Serialized Form

      • ErrorLocation

        public ErrorLocation(SyntacticPosition begin,
             SyntacticPosition end)
        Constructs an ErrorLocation instance for given syntactic positions.
        Parameters:
        begin - the syntactic position where the location begins
        end - the syntactic position where the location ends

      • ErrorLocation

        public ErrorLocation(int beginLine,
             int beginColumn,
             int endLine,
             int endColumn)
        Constructs an ErrorLocation instance for given lines and columns.
        Parameters:
        beginLine - line where the location begins
        beginColumn - column where the location begins
        endLine - line where the location ends
        endColumn - column where the location ends

      • translate

        public ErrorLocation translate(int lineShift,
                      int columnShift)
        Returns a copy of the ErrorLocation. The copy has begin line and end line decreased by lineShift and if applicable, also by columnShift.

        columnShift only applies if the new line number is 1.

        Parameters:
        lineShift - number of lines to subtract
        columnShift - number of letters to subtract (applies to the first line only)
        Returns:
        a new ErrorLocation with modified position

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
